duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, document, and execute manual test cases for complex API, web, and mobile based applications with DB components.
Estimate tasks and work with minimal guidance and supervision.
Provide technical guidance and training for junior team members.
Assist in all phases and types of software testing – functional, acceptance, regression, performance, automated, end-to-end, etc.
Work closely with development team to identify and diagnose issues and resolve problems.
Ensure that all defects are documented, tracked, and updated during the testing cycle using the bug documentation software.
Relay pertinent defect information to QA/Development/Product team members.
Participate in Team Meetings to discuss team goals, tasks, and tools.
Champion best practices for QA testing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
